data.text: @maxjohnporter @waywardprods Oh, how disappointing for you all, Max. I hope healthy days come quickly.

@maxjohnporter @waywardprods @UnionChapelUK @ninaconti @InuaEllams And I couldn't make it this week and was so sorry - but I can make July 9th and it will go straight into the diary. Hoping for better times ahead....
@maxjohnporter @waywardprods @UnionChapelUK @ninaconti @InuaEllams There is no upside but at least I have now seen notice of one person whose been cancelled - hope all works out in July
@maxjohnporter @waywardprods @UnionChapelUK @ninaconti @InuaEllams So sorry to hear but we will be out in force to support you all in July. Get well soon!
@maxjohnporter @waywardprods @UnionChapelUK @ninaconti @InuaEllams Looking forward to it in July!
@maxjohnporter @waywardprods @UnionChapelUK @ninaconti @InuaEllams Oh Max. Hopefully all will be well soon
@maxjohnporter @waywardprods @UnionChapelUK @ninaconti @InuaEllams Wishing you very well, very soon! Something to look forward to in July. 🙂
